name: I Was A Star
description:
Play as a lonely star wandering around the universe. Use your light to find precious things drifting in space. There are evil things in the dark. Don't let them touch you or they'll steal your light.

Made for Mini Jam 15 - Technology . The limitation was a restricted color palette. My concept was of a star that collected human "technology" All sound, art, and programming done by me.

KNOWN ISSUES/BUGS:

  • On occasion, the player can get stunned right before their light turns off
  • After the game has been played once, you must refresh the page to play it again
  • The sound sometimes doesn't start until the second line of text starts
  • VERY Rarely stars appear out of sight on the edges of the screen and you have to run along the edges to get them.

I know it's not perfect, but I hope you enjoy it anyways! Please leave a comment!
